about_the_game:
Wayward Soundtrack: Volume Beta is the long awaited follow-up to the original 9 tracks, composed and produced by Austin Dhillon throughout 2018.

Released as part of Beta 2.7, these hip-hop inspired tracks range from dreamlike to dark and provide a mysterious backdrop to Wayward's survival experience.

All tracks are provided in .mp3 format at a 320kbps bitrate. You can play the soundtrack via the Steam client from inside the "Music" section in your library, or externally by navigating to the soundtrack folder within the Wayward Steam folder.

Purchasing this soundtrack directly supports Austin Dhillon.
